chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My product iPhone 13 has the above problem:

There are two problems:
- The battery heats up a lot without an apparent reason (since startup) and discharges at an abnormal rate.
- I cannot turn off the camera shutter sound, even after following BackMarket's advice (updating iOS). It seems that this is due to the iPhone's origin (Japan). The inability to turn off this sound is a decisive criterion for me.

Thank you very much for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

You have received the product for exchange, the 29.05.2024. The delay to repair or exchange the product is 3 days for technical issue. Without answer with a valid tracking link before the 04.06.2024 we will refund the customer.

Thank you for understanding,
Claudia from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we have insufficient stocks available for an exchange. Instead we have fully refunded the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
CH
